content: folly waves baby blanket this pattern is often used with an 18 stitch repeat adding a few more stitches gives it more wave to the pattern it curves up and down like repeating waves at the beach before they break baby blanket was worked in bernat baby softee antique white #3 dk yarn 2 5 skeins were used i cast on 204 stitches # 3 dk yarn 32 circular #6 needle 4mm 22 stitches x 30 row for gauge needs not to be exact start with required number of stitches for the size and weight yarn you will be using less repeats of the pattern for heavier weight yarns consult stitch gauge on ball band top and bottom border was 4 row of garter 2 ridges or 8 row of seed stitch begin on right side row 1 of charts edge border was 6 stitches of seed stitch each side pattern assembly as follows garter or seed border bottom and top knitters choice place markers between every 24 stitch repeats they will save you a lot of counting count the number of yo between stitch markers should be 8 holes check often saves a lot of frogging 6 seed stitch 192 feather and fan for waves 6 seed stitch=204 total feather and fan panel 24 stitches there should be 8 yo per repeat row 1 rs k2tog 4x k1 yo k1 7x yo k2tog 4x total of 24 stitches between markers row 2 4 ws purl all stitches except seed edge border row 3 rs k all stitches except seed edge border repeat these 4 row for pattern comes to 32 wide give or take you can add or delete panels depending on the yarn used length can be any distance you would like consult blanket dimension charts on line for sizing feather and fan ripple 24 stitch pattern 4 k2tog 3 yo 2 purl 1 rs 11 april 2020 revision 1
